mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM t_guard_device gd LEFT JOIN t_device_position dp ON gd.position_id = dp.id LEFT JOIN t_project p ON gd.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN basic.t_device d ON gd.device_global_id = d.global_id LEFT JOIN property.t_sys_dict sd on sd.group_code = 'DEVICE_TYPE' AND sd.value = d.type

SELECT gd.id AS id, gd.guard_name AS guardName, gd.project_id AS projectId, p.full_name AS projectName, position_id AS positionId, dp.name AS positionName, sd.name AS deviceType FROM property.t_guard_card_privilege gcp LEFT JOIN property.t_guard_device gd ON gd.id = gcp.guard_device_id LEFT JOIN property.t_device_position dp ON dp.id = gd.position_id LEFT JOIN property.t_project p ON p.id = gd.project_id LEFT JOIN property.t_sys_dict sd on sd.group_code = 'DEVICE_TYPE' AND sd.value = dp.device_type WHERE gcp.card_id = #{cardId}
